phrases: Christmas is just around the corner, huh?
Do you guys already have plans?
I am not doing anything.
Listen, Master Raku...
My father will not be home on Christmas Eve, so...
I will be home...
Uh, I mean, of course I will be spending it with Honey!
My, how callous!
Hey, since we are here, why do not we throw a Christmas party?
You know, get together and have a blast?
Sure, as long as the event planner's a no-show.
Even though it was my idea?
So?
What are we going to do for real?
In our case, we really do have to...
Ch-Christmas?
Chitoge?
Need
Your mom's coming back?
That is right.
Every Christmas, my mom comes home,
and it is just the three of us over the holidays,
so it does not look like I can attend that party.
Why does that make you hate Christmas?
Come to think of it, where is your mom usually?
I mean, she does not seem to be living with you.
She is traveling all over the world.
She is still working as a high-powered female CEO.
That mom of mine...
She owns companies all over the world,
and I have heard that her annual income once topped 10 billion dollars!
Her schedule's crammed for the next ten years,
and it is even been said
that the Nikkei Index fluctuates according to my mom's mood that day.
She seriously sounds like a total badass.
But most incredible of all...
She is scary when she gets mad!
Absolutely terrifying!
That scary?
Really?
But she sounds like a good mom.
Spending Christmas with you every year when she is so busy.
Is she... really?
I am a little uncomfortable with her.
Mom had me when she was really young,
but she is been wrapped up in her work ever since,
so as far back as I can remember, I have only seen her a few times a year.
Honestly, I do not really know how it feels to have a mom.
Why should I have to tell you all this stuff?!
You are the one who brought it up...
Dad
Incoming call
Huh?
It is from Dad.
What does he want?
Whaaat?!
What is wrong?
He says Mom's coming home tomorrow.
What?
But it is not even Christmas yet.
And also...
He wants to introduce you to my mom,
so he told me to invite you!
Hey!
Where the hell's that wine I ordered?
How is the decorating going?
Is the food ready yet?
We are doing it now!
Wow...
They are unusually nimble today.
Looks like they are on high alert.
Hurry the hell up!
Madam Flower will be arriving soon!
Madam Flower?
They are talking about my mom.
Since Mom's first name is Hana Kirisaki.
I see you came dressed in a suit, like I told you.
Do we really need to go this far?
It is just your mom coming home, right?
Do not be such an idiot!
Look, you...
try saying or doing something funny in front of Mom!
You will not live to tell the tale!
How scary can she be?
Be on your best behavior, all right?
I am introducing you to her as my boyfriend, after all.
Yeah, yeah.
Still, no matter how dressed up you get,
you wear that ribbon no matter what, huh?
You did not change ribbons like you did the other day, you know?
Well, sure, I have other ribbons, but...
But this ribbon is special.
Because Mom gave it to me years ago.
Hey, Raku!
Long time no see.
Oh, hello.
Sorry to summon you on short notice.
Have you been doing okay?
Yes.
It is just been so hard, finding time to introduce you to her.
Not at all.
Listen, Daddy has a stomachache all of a sudden!
Would you mind taking over from here?
You cannot do that to me, Dad!
You stay right here with me!
How freaked out are you two?
Madam Flower has arrived!
She is here for real, guys!
Take your positions, everybody!
I am home.
So this is Chitoge's mom?
She is a real beauty!
I mean, she is got this amazing aura.
But... even if she had Chitoge at a young age...
If she told me she was her big sister, I would believe her!
Hey, Hana...
It is been a long time!
I have missed you so!
Adelt!
I am home, Adelt!
I have missed you, too!
You must be worn out from all that hard work.
I think you have lost some weight, have not you?
How long can you stay in Japan?
I will be here till Christmas night.
Although I will only have 2 hours and 36 minutes for myself.
Hey.
What is this?
She actually looks pretty nice.
Though you were not joking about her crazy schedule.
Can you take a short break, maybe?
For today, we have prepared all of your favorites.
Sorry, but it is right back to work for me.
By the way, Adelt...
Do you remember?
Two months and 15 days ago, I asked you to do something for me, did not I?
Since you said you knew one of the directors of that brokerage in Rome,
I asked you to arrange for a deal with them.
Whatever became of that, I wonder?
W-Well, Hana, the thing is, it is pretty complicated, so...
I am asking you a question, Adelt.
Did you get it done?
Or not?
Which is it?
I have not done a thing!
Lock him up in the library right away.
If you do not get it done by Christmas, I am going to gouge your eyeballs!
T-Terrifying!
I mean, that is a gang boss she is talking to!
Jeez, the old guy's a total henpecked husband!
Now, then...
Is Chitoge around?
Y-Yes!
Long time no see!
Have you been well?
Uh...
how old are you now, again?
Uh, yes!
I am now sixteen years old!
Mother!
Mother?
I see.
You have grown up a lot.
What about school?
Uh, yes!
I was ranked fifth in our grade after a test the other day.
I see... fifth?
Chitoge?
That really does not make sense, does it?
That junior high you graduated from was one of the top schools in the YOU.S.
And you graduated first in your class.
As for the high school you are attending now,
I hear that it is quite average by Japanese academic standards.
So what is wrong with this picture?
I promise to study harder!
Chitoge's so freaked out, she is vibrating like a cell phone!
But still, this mom of hers is deadly scary.
The intimidation factor is mind-blowing!
Oh, my...
Who on earth is this?
Mother!
Allow me to introduce him.
This is my boyfriend.
P-Pleased to meet you!
I am Raku Ichijo!
Boyfriend?
Ichijo?
Ichijo, as in... surely not...
Yes.
It is probably what you are thinking of...
Ichijo as in the Shuei-gumi.
Oh, but I assure you,
I am seeing your daughter in the most impeccable, honorable way imaginable.
Oh?
Is that right?
Please look after my daughter, little boy.
However...
If you ever hurt her in any way, what I am going to do to you...
Can you imagine it?
Y-Yes.
Rest assured!
Because I will exceed anything you might imagine.
She is scaring me at every turn, this woman!
Still, a boyfriend for you, eh?
My, how time flies!
So you have reached that age, have you?
What is this...
That ribbon...
You are still wearing that thing?
It is completely frayed.
A ribbon like that, I can buy you as many as you need.
You are a girl, after all.
You need to be more stylish, or you will chase your boyfriend away.
Wear a prettier one, will you?
All right.
Now, then, that is it for me today.
Chitoge?
We will have a nice chat on Christmas Eve, all right?
I have to admit, she really was a terror.
Like a storm.
Madam, we have a problem.
Another secretary has collapsed.
Again?
How many does that make this month?
I swear, it is a mere 72-hour shift... how pathetic.
Any backups?
Actually, all of them are still in the hospital.
Is that right?
That is a problem, then.
I know.
Hey, little boy!
Starting now, till Christmas, work as my secretary.
H-Hold on!
Mother, are you serious?!
My, my!
Of course I am serious.
I have no intention of allowing my daughter to date a do-nothing.
The timing could not be better,
and I am thinking it will give me the chance to see for myself if he is worthy of you.
No, but that does not mean...
But seriously... your secretary, all of a
If you are not up to it, then that is fine with me, too.
In that case, I will have you drowned in Tokyo Bay tomorrow.
That said...
If you do manage to gain my approval,
I will reward you two with a night in an ultra suite at a five-star hotel on Christmas Eve.
All right, let us go.
Carry him to the car.
Seriously?!
I am seriously doing this?!
Ichijo... right.
That kid from ten years ago, eh?
Now, then, let us see how you have grown.
Well, well!
You do clean up nicely.
Uh... am I really going to do this?
It is so out of the blue.
But of course!
Do not worry.
All you have to do is follow my every order, to the letter.
For starters, skim through these.
That is my schedule for today,
and also a manual for what is expected of you as my secretary.
Excuse me...
Memorize it all in five minutes, okay?
Yes, very well.
Put together your proposals
on how the 5 EU corporations should make inroads into new markets.
What did the research yield?
Unbelievable...
Look at all these documents!
Is this really just her schedule for today?
I have never seen a minute-by-minute schedule before in my life!
Not only that... though I cannot be sure about this...
That meeting she is been taking part in.
As far as I can tell, she is speaking in at least five different languages!
What kind of a high-spec mom is she, anyway?!
All right!
What is first on the agenda today, little boy?
Oh, right!
Today, you are going to head over to...
RAKU
This company's gigantic!
What are you doing?
Get yourself over here!
I am sincerely sorry for summoning you here on account of our blunder.
Please step on me.
Not happening!
That is revolting.
The president of a major corporation is prostrating himself!
Putting me to so much trouble when it was your own mistake.
You certainly have some nerve.
Please accept my sincere...
She stepped on him anyway!
Just what kind of a hotshot is she?
Uh, excuse me...
Mother?
Hey...
I think it is still too early for you to call me Mother.
Then what should I call you?
Let us see...
As a special privilege, I am going to let you call me Ms. Hana.
Th-Then Ms. Hana...
What am I supposed to do, exactly?
Right.
Okay, your first task, little boy...
Go buy a Coke somewhere around here.
Within the next three hours.
A Coke, did you say?
Yes.
If there is anything else I need, I will let you know later.
This might actually be an easy job.
Hana Kirisaki Connected
Hello?
It is me.
There is something I would like to add to your shopping list.
Do you mind?
Ms. Hana?
Yes.
What should I get?
You see, the daughter of one of my clients in Canada
is absolutely pining for a stuffed animal that is only available at Disney*** in Japan,
so could you go get one?
Also, I want you to buy the entire line of Japan-only limited editions of Chan** handbags.
Also...
H-Hold up!
Hold up a second!
Dis***?
Excuse me, but do you know how long it will take to travel?
Oh, but that is not my concern.
Figure it out somehow.
You can charge as much as you need on my card.
Just make sure you do your best.
Figure it out, did she say?
And let me remind you, I expect you to be punctual.
If, by any chance, you are late...
Killing you will only be the tip of the iceberg.
Also, a friend of mine in L.A. has a favorite Japanese sweet, so please get some of those, too.
Also, the son of *** in Paris wants a figurine from Akihabara...
What is up with all this?!
I got what you asked for!
Somehow, I made it back in time!
Good job, little boy.
Kudos to you for making it back.
But what a shame.
You are thirty seconds late, did you know that?
The fact that you were late by thirty seconds, see...
Means that my schedule will get pushed back thirty seconds.
A deal that could have been struck if I would had thirty more seconds
will end up not being struck, in other words.
Do you understand?
My motto is, Time is not money.
Money cannot buy time.
Am I right?
Y-Yes.
As long as you understand that, it is fine.
All right, what is my next appointment?
Right!
Um...
A product meeting at AB Corp.
Well, well!
That is one of my subsidiaries.
It is the building next door.
Oh, then I will have them bring the car around.
That would be wasting too much time.
Wait there for a second.
It is me.
I am coming over there now, so do your thing.
Understood.
Um... Ms. Hana, what are you doing?
Ms. Hana!
Do not tell me you are...
We have been waiting for you, Boss.
Let us start this meeting.
Just now, I thought I heard Raku's voice from up above.
But really, look how the whole city's in full Christmas mode.
Incoming call
Raku
From Raku?
What does he want?
Connected
Hello?
H-Hey... is that you, Chitoge?
Why do you sound like that?
I finally got to go on a short break now, see.
But hey, I have to say...
Your mom is way beyond demonic, huh?
I get that a lot.
So, what is up?
Oh, nothing.
I just thought you might be feeling down.
Why would I...?
Yesterday, what you really wanted was for your mom to say,
It makes me so happy to see you still wearing that ribbon.
Right?
It has nothing to do with you!
You know it does.
It totally does.
I do not know how serious Ms. Hana was
about letting us spend the night together on Christmas Eve if she approved of me,
but you...
What you really want is to spend Christmas Eve with your mom, right?
I am worried.
That the truth is my mom does not have the slightest interest in me at all.
Well, this is what Mom always asks, every time I see her.
How old are you now?
She cannot seem to remember, no matter how many times I tell her.
And when I do see her, all she does is yell at me.
She never praises me, not even once.
And she is always only cold to me.
Even this...
I bet she said that as she does not want to spend Christmas Eve with me.
You know that is not true!
There is no way she would not want to see her own daughter!
Hey, do not worry.
That lady's so swamped,
but she is always made a point of coming home for Christmas at least, right?
This time, you invite her.
Tell her that you want to spend Christmas Eve with her.
If you are honest with her about how you feel, she might come through for you, right?
You... think so?
It is going to be all right.
She is your mom, is not she?
All right.
I will give it a try.
Right.
Good luck to you!
Th-Thank y
Raku
Connected
Sorry, Chitoge!
I am getting a call from Ms. Hana!
I got to get going!
Okay, give it all you have got!
Bye.
Be honest, huh?
Hello?
Uh... Um...
Mother?
It is me.
Chitoge?
Well, how unusual.
Um... Listen...
What do you want?
I am busy with work right now, so if we could pick this up later...
I am sorry!
This will not take long!
Um...
about letting Raku and me spend Christmas Eve if you approved of him...
I would like you to call that off.
Oh?
But why?
M-Mother...
Oh, that is all right.
Do not think about me.
You would rather spend Christmas Eve with him, right?
N-No, I...!
And besides, I have switched my schedule to get some work done on Christmas Eve,
so either way, it is not going to work.
Is there anything else?
No?
Then I am hanging up.
Why did you turn her down?
What are you talking about?
That call just now... it was from Chitoge, was not it?
So why?
Because I have work to do.
I thought I would not be spending Christmas Eve with her,
so I scheduled some appointments beforehand.
Then at least get her a Christmas present!
I will go out and buy whatever you want!
No need for that.
Never mind that,
I need to get this work done now, since I have another appointment.
Is your job that important to you?
Why are you so into it?
Because no one can do it but me,
and because I am needed.
If you have the ability, it is your duty to exercise it... that is my way of thinking.
As long as I am needed, I will continue to exercise my abilities.
Come on, your hands are idle, little boy.
Get those documents filed, please!
What the hell is that?
Because no one can do it but me?
Because I am needed?
Do not you see that the person closest to you is the one who needs you the most?
My bad, Chitoge.
